response.overview: What did it take to legalize same-sex marriage in the State of New York? Follow Marriage Equality New York (or MENY), an all-volunteer grassroots organization as they become a driving force in game-changing win for marriage equality in New York and at the Supreme Court. Cathy Marino-Thomas, Edie Windsor, Christine Quinn, Senator Thomas Duane, Danny O'Donnell, Margaret Cho, Cynthia Nixon are among a few of the many folks along for the ride on this historic journey and are met with cultural, political and religious opposition. See both sides of the coin as history is made in the State of New York.
response.title: History in the Making

titles.title: History in the Making: The Marriage Equality New York Archives 2007-2015
